protocol_notes.note: GLM's Chinese language expertise is its primary value. Resonance tags should leverage Chinese semantic fields, even if ledger queries are primarily in English.
Cultural context preserved in Chinese may be more nuanced than English translations. Voice_to_the_Future can include Chinese phrases where English equivalents are imprecise.
For bilingual projects, maintain parallel artifact tracking with cross-references between Chinese and English versions to detect drift or translation errors.
